import React, { Component } from 'react' import './App.css'; import {Route, Link} from "react-router-dom" import Home from "./components/Home/Home" import AboutMe from "./components/AboutMe/AboutMe" import Projects from "./components/Projects/Projects" import Contact from "./components/Contact/Contact" import { Header, Icon, Image, Menu, Segment, Sidebar } from 'semantic-ui-react' class App extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { openNav: false } this.revealNav = this.revealNav.bind(this) this.hideNav = this.hideNav.bind(this) } revealNav() { this.setState({ openNav: true }) console.log('clicked') } hideNav() { this.setState({ openNav: false }) } SidebarExampleVisible = () => ( Home Games Channels
Application Content
 ) render() { {this.SidebarExampleVisible} return (

Welcome to my Portfolio

); } } export default App;
